statements: DELETE FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_type = 'Earthquake' AND casualties > 50;
DELETE FROM EmergencyData WHERE event_location = 'Downtown' AND casualties > 10
DELETE FROM incident_responders WHERE responder_id = 101 AND department = 'Fire'
DELETE FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Medical' AND severity > 5

DELETE FROM response_team WHERE team_name = 'Medical Team' AND availability_status = false;
